result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Dennis P. Gleichauf

records.addlTxt: Status conference on December 13, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

11:10 AM Defendant Dennis P. Gleichauf in court.  Attorney Tripp Stroud in court for Dennis P. Gleichauf.  Attorney Curtis E Johnson in court for State of Wisconsin. Atty Stroud states they have offer.  Status set for Dec. 13, 2022 at 2:00 pm.

9:35 AM Defendant Dennis P. Gleichauf in court.  Attorney Trevor A. Paulson, making special appearance, in court for Dennis P. Gleichauf.  Attorney Zachary Leigh in court for State of Wisconsin.   Court makes record on disqualification/recusal determination - defendant wishes to waive right to disqualification/recusal.
Status conference scheduled for October 25, 2022 at 11:00 am.
Status conference on October 25, 2022 at 11:00 am.

DA Zach Leigh appears for the State of Wisconsin; Dennis Gleichauf appears via zoom from the Iowa Co. Jail.  DA Leigh requests BW be vacated.  So ordered.  Ct. hears from DA Leigh and Mr. Gleichauf.  DA Leigh defers to Court re cash bond.  Ct. issues $1500 cash bond total (additional $300 each re Case Nos. 21 CM 119, 21 CT 85, 22 CM 24, 22 CM 116 and the new unfiled case, other bond conditions to remain).  Ct. sets status conference for 09/20/2022 at 9:00 a.m.
Status conference on September 20, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Status conference on March 20, 2022 at 09:00 am.

3:31 PM Defendant Dennis P. Gleichauf not in court.  Attorney Curtis E Johnson in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Tripp Stroud in court for Dennis P. Gleichauf. Due to non-appearance, State requests a BW.  Court orders BW.

8:41 AM Defendant Dennis P. Gleichauf not in court.  Attorney Curtis E Johnson in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Tripp Stroud in court for Dennis P. Gleichauf.  BW requested.  Reset for July 12, 2022 at 3:00 pm.  If defendant does not appear, bench warrant will be issued.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 12, 2022 at 03:00 pm.
Plea/sentencing hearing on July 12, 2022 at 03:00 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Dennis P. Gleichauf
Current: 2984 Main Street, Blue Mounds, WI 53517 United States  (Effective: 06-03-2022)
Prior: 862 Brown Street, Arena, WI 53503

10:38 AM Attorney Curtis E Johnson in court for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Donald Ritchey Stroud III appeared by video for Dennis P. Gleichauf.  Authorization to appear.  Request for PLEAS.
Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 11, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Plea/sentencing hearing on July 11, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Booking; No operation of a motor vehicle without a valid driver's license.   Defendant is to contact the Iowa County Sheriff's Department at 608-935-3314 to make arrangements for booking by 03/28/2022.

4:15 PM Defendant Dennis P. Gleichauf appeared in court with Attorney Donald Ritchey Stroud, III, Attorney Curtis E Johnson for State of Wisconsin appeared in court.    Court verbally reviews charges/penalties with the defendant. Waiver of formal reading of complaint. Defendant stands mute - not guilty plea entered.  $500 signature bond - no operation of a motor vehicle without a valid driver's license; booking by 03/28/2022.
Status conference scheduled for April 26, 2022 at 10:30 am.
